Auto open book in fullscreen: Avaa kirja automaattisesti koko näytön tilassa
Access token expired, refetching token: Pääsypoletti on vanhentunut, noudetaan poletti uudelleen
Author: Tekijä
This action will move this book and its: Tämä toiminto siirtää kirjan ja siihen liittyvät muistiinpanot, kirjanmerkit ja korostukset roskakoriin
This action won't delete the original bo: Tämä toiminto ei poista alkuperäistä kirjaa
Too many images: Tämä kirja sisältää liian monta kuvaa
Audio is not ready yet: Tekstistä puheeksi -toiminto ei ole vielä valmis
Move your mouse on the top of any book,: Siirrä hiiren osoitin minkä tahansa kirjan päälle, napsauta sydämen kuvaketta lisätäksesi kirjan suosikkeihin
Select any text and click the note butto: Valitse mitä tahansa tekstiä ja napsauta Muistiinpano-painiketta ponnahdusvalikosta
Select any text and click the highlight: Valitse mitä tahansa tekstiä ja napsauta Korosta-painiketta ponnahdusvalikosta
Shelf title can't be pure number: Hyllyn nimi ei voi olla pelkkä numero
When deleting books, they will be delete: Kun kirjoja poistetaan, ne poistetaan pysyvästi sen sijaan, että kirjat siirrettäisiin roskakoriin
Hide books which have been added to the: Piilota kirjat, jotka on jo lisätty hyllyyn, jotta ne eivät ole esillä etusivulla
Delete book from shelf also deleting boo: Kirjan poistaminen hyllystä poistaa kirjan kokonaan
When deleting book from shelf, the book: Kun kirja poistetaan hyllystä, poista kirja kokonaan
Auto open book in full screen: Automatically open book in full screen
Please authorize your account, and fill: Please authorize your account, and fill the following input with the token
This process is inreversible, and will c: This process is irreversible, and will completely overwrite your current library, make sure you know what you're doing before proceeding
Lemmatize words when looking up in a dic: Lemmatize words when looking up in a dictionary
To reduce the different forms of a word: To reduce the different forms of a word to one single form, for example, reducing builds, building or built to build, reducing cats to cat, reducing fastest to fast
Precache books after import to increase: Pre-cache books after import to increase opening speed, Koodo will generate a pre-cache version of the original book and save it into your library
Don't use first page as PDF cover: Don't use first page as PDF cover
You may see this error when the book you: You may see this error when the book you're importing is not supported by Koodo Reader, try converting it with Calibre
Turn off touch screen mode: Turn off touch screen mode (preventing accidentally touch)
For better user experince, please visit: For better user experience, please visit this site on a computer
Only desktop support this format: Only the desktop version supports this format
Only desktop support this service: Only the desktop version supports this service
WebDAV Info: WebDAV is an easy-to-use and efficient backup solution, we recommand using WebDAV service provided by NextCloud
This action will remove all the books in: This action will permanently remove all the books in the trash, together with their notes, bookmarks, and digests
Batch import only support epub or pdf fi: Batch import only support ePub or pdf files
Sync function works with third-party clo: Synchronisation function works with third-party cloud storage. You need to change the storage location to the same cloud storage folder on different computers. When you click the sync button, Koodo Reader will automatically upload or download your data from this folder and keep data synchronized across all you computers. Visit our document for more instructions.
Please turn off open books in the main w: Please close open books in the main window first
Please turn off merge with word first: Please turn off merge with word first
Data change detected, whether to update?: Data change detected. Do you want to update?
Auto Update relies on GitHub Release for: Auto Update relies on GitHub Release for package hosting, if your internet doesn't have stable connection to GitHub, we highly recommand you to turn off this option
Right click on any book and click add to: Right click on any book and click Add to Favorite to add it to your favorite books
Move your mouse on top of any book, then: Move your mouse on top of any book, then click the more icon to add the book to the shelf
Download failed, network problem or no b: Download failed, network problem or no backup
Move your mouse on the top edge of the r: Move your mouse on the top edge of the reader
Download failed,network problem or no ba: Download failed,network problem or no backup
When Koodo is running, your computer won: When Koodo is running, your computer won't enter sleep mode
Get rid of window frame, make reader hid: Get rid of window frame, make reader hide into Word or any text editor, and can't be detected. You need to set up the reader's position, size and style first.
The imported books will not be copied to: The imported books will not be copied to the library, only linked to the original book path
Reader menu will not be triggered by hov: Reader menu will not be triggered by hovering but clicking on the area
The book that you read from last time wi: The book you read last will open automatically at launch
All the folded content will be expanded: All the folded content will be expanded in the navigation panel
Reader window will be maximized to fit t: Reader window will be maximized to fit the screen when opening a book
Book won't be opened in a separate windo: Book won't be opened in a separate window but directly opened in the main window
When opening books in the file manager w: When opening books in the file manager with Koodo, the opened books won't be added to the library
Please turn off open books in the main w: Please close open books in the main window
This action will delete all the notes, b: This action will delete all the notes, bookmarks, and digests of this book
Koodo Reader's web version are limited b: Koodo Reader's web version are limited by the browser, for more powerful features, please download the desktop version.
Turn it on when you want Koodo to work w: Turn it on when you want Koodo to work with other third-party translation service, right clicking on the selected text will trigger popup again
When deleting books, they will be delete: When deleting books, they will be permanently deleted instead of being sent to the trash
This action will permanently delete the: This action will permanently delete the selected books, together with their notes, bookmarks and digests
Use SSL, 1 for use, 0 for not use: Use SSL, 1 for use, 0 for not use
Thanks for using the developer version o: Thanks for using the developer version of Koodo Reader, leave a comment if you encounter any problems. Note that we can't reply to you from here. For faster and better support, please visit
You're not using the latest version of K: You're not using the latest version of Koodo Reader. Please update to the latest version to see if the problem still exsits
Your email(optional), We may contact you: Your email(optional), We may contact you for further investigation
